overview: A special experiment for Widescreen Weekend, taking the beloved tradition of Cinerama and bringing it to a new audience on a modern immersive format.  The incredibly wide footage has been mapped onto our Immersive Encounters dome to brilliant effect. Youâ€™ll be astounded at the images that were captured over 60 years ago and lovingly restored through the efforts of Cinerama, Inc. A specially prepared exhibition of clips from Cineramas South Seas Adventure adapted for viewing inside the dome.
title: Cinerama in the Dome
